subject: re:Special offer
body:
Dear customer.
This is the letter from the CanadianPharmacy. We prove that "generic" doesn't necessarily mean "expensive". If you shop for drugs online, please, read this to the end.
Our advice for everyone shopping for medications on the Web is to cling to reliable licensed pharmacies that have been operating on the Internet market for quite a long time already (such as CanadianPharmacy). Want to save on drugs? Try CanadianPharmacy - #1 discount Canadian pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy your #1 source for cheap generic drugs from Canada.
Yours,Evelyn Gould
